DOC.brief_title: Survey Women 's Choice Delivery Before Consulting With Her Obstetrician
DOC.detailed_description: This survey woman previous cesarean section , also know c-section , last pregnancy . The study look factor people may influence decision woman make birthing plan previous c-section . If qualify , woman ask complete brief survey initial Ob/Gyn appointment see Ob doctor . In order qualify , woman must : - Be pregnant - Have see obstetrician pregnancy - Be least 18 year old - Be able read English - Have prior pregnancy deliver c-section - Only one prior c-section - The c-section must last pregnancy one Questions ask include : - Demographic information ( example : age , race/ethnicity ) - Pregnancy information - Delivery question - Factors may influence birth plan Participants also ask study staff follow delivery see kind delivery ( vaginal c-section ) .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant Women 18 year old old Prior pregnancy cesarean delivery No prior obstetric physician care current pregnancy More one prior cesarean Women read English
